title: Job Vacancies at Stellar International Ant Recycling Technology
content:
Stellar International Ant Recycling Technology Company Limited is a subsidiary of RSIN Group which entered Africa in 2008 By advanced plastic recycling technology , production equipment and excellent personnel team . Our main product included : chemical fiber, pet bottles, strapping bands ,woven bags, mattresses, crawling mats.

We are recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the following positions below:

1.) Sales Manager

Job Locations: Yola - Adamawa, Gombe, Jos - Plateau,
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilties
     

            
    




	Team Leadership: Recruit, train, motivate, and mentor sales representatives; conduct one-on-ones and performance evaluations.
	Strategy & Planning: Develop and implement sales plans, set quotas, define territories, and create promotional campaigns.
	Performance Management: Monitor KPIs (pipeline, forecast accuracy, quota attainment), analyze sales data, and adjust strategies.
	Sales Operations: Oversee the entire sales process, manage CRM hygiene, and ensure smooth pipeline flow.
	Reporting: Prepare regular reports and forecasts for senior management (Sales Director/CEO).
	Collaboration: Liaise with Marketing, Product, and Customer Success teams for alignment and feedback.
	Client Relations: Manage key client relationships and assist with complex contract negotiations.


Qualifications


	Interested candidates should possess an HND / Bachelor`s Degree with 3 - 5 years of experience.


Salary
N150,000 - N200,000 monthly.

Application Closing Date: 5th February, 2026.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:Stellarinternationalhr@gmail.comcc: isreal@hengxingcompany.comusing the Job Position and location as the subject of the mail.

 

2.) Warehouse Assistant

Job Locations: Kano and Port Harcourt - Rivers 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
We are looking for a hardworking and reliable Warehouse assistant to join our team in PH and Kano


	The ideal candidate will be responsible counting of goodsduring loading and unloading.
	Responsible for managing inbound and outbound operations, ensuring efficient movement of goods,
	Assist the warehouse supervisor in carrying out all general warehouse duties to maintain smooth daily operations.


Key Responsibilities


	Receive, inspect, and record incoming goods (inbound).
	Prepare and dispatch outgoing goods (outbound).
	Ensure accurate inventory management and stock control.
	Maintain cleanliness and orderliness of the warehouse at all times.
	Assist in loading and offloading of goods.
	Ensure all warehouse activities comply with company policies and safety standards.
	Support other operational tasks as assigned by the warehouse supervisor.


Basic salary
N70,000.00 + 10,000 Performance bonus.+ 1500 daily transportation subsidy

Application Closing Date: 31st January, 2026.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: stellarinternationalhr@gmail.com cc: isreal@hengxingcompany.com using “Warehouse Assistant "and Location" as the subject of the email.

 

3.) Sales Representative

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are looking for Sales Representatives to join us.
	If you are goal-driven, persuasive, and passionate about sales, this is a great opportunity to grow with us.


Responsibilities


	Promote and sell company products to customers.
	Build and maintain strong customer relationships.
	Achieve individual and team sales targets.
	Provide excellent customer service and handle inquiries effectively.
	Keep accurate records of sales activities and customer feedback.


Requirements


	Minimum of an OND qualification.
	Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
	Previous experience in sales/marketing of steel products will be an added advantage.
	Ability to work with targets and deliver results.
	Must reside in Port-Harcourt.


Basic Salary
N80,000 + 1,500 dailt transport + commission.

Application Closing Date: 30th January, 2026.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: Stellarinternationaljobs@gmail.com using the Job Position and Location as the subject.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Project Manager",
  "description": "AL- Truehand Better Design Limited is an architectural anda multidisciplinary design companyfocused on providing premium design andachievable solutions. With a strong belief that everyone deserves better design. We focus on all kinds of designs and renovation, turnkey delivery, interiors, finishing and furnishingand general construction.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Project Manager
Job Location:&nbsp;Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilties


	Develop detailed project plans, including scope, timelines, budgets, and resource allocation.
	Monitor project progress, make adjustments as necessary, and ensure timely completion.
	Planning, coordinating and managing all phases of all design and construction projects, including project initiation, planning, execution, monitoring and closeout.
	Conduct risk assessments and develop mitigation strategies.
	Coordinate with the design team, operations and other contractorsto ensure all project timeline and deliverables are met.
	Collaborate with clients to understand project requirements and expectations.
	Select and manage subcontractors, ensuring they meet project specifications.
	Conduct regular site visits to monitor progress, quality, and safety.
	Resolve any issues or challenges that may arise during construction.
	Lead cross-functional project teams, including architects, engineers, and contractors.
	Foster collaboration and communication among stakeholders.
	Manage conflicts and resolve disputes.
	Liaise with clients to understand requirements and expectations.
	Provide project updates and progress reportsand ensure client satisfaction
	Ensure adherence to regulatory requirements, building codes, and company policies.
	Manage project documentation, records, and reporting.
	Ensure compliance with building codes, regulations, and safety standards.
	Assist in implementing best practices and standardized procedures to streamline projectworkflows.
	Stay updated on industry trends and best practices in projectmanagement.
	Train and supervise team membersensuring compliance with standard operating procedures.
	Provide regular status reports to Management and clients.
	Send the monthly project report to Management.
	Carry out any other duty as assigned.


Requirements


	A minimum of a Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Engineering, Quality Control, or other relevant fields.
	Minimum of 2 to 8 years of proven experience in a similar role in the architectural or construction industry is an added advantage.
	Professional certifications such as PMP (Project Management Professional), COREN, H.S E Certification or equivalent are preferred.
	Master Degree is an added advantage
	Strong project management skills (scheduling, budgeting, risk management).
	Excellent communication, leadership, and interpersonal skills.
	Proficient in project management software (MS Project, Primavera, Asana, Trello).
	Familiarity with construction management systems (CMS).
	Knowledge of building codes, regulations, and safety standards.
	Strong attention to details and organizational skills.
	Excellent communication and problem-solving skills.
	Ability to supervise and train teammembers.
	Experience working with cross-functional teams is an advantage.
	Ability to multitask and manage time effectively.


Preferred Candidates


	Excellent time management, organization, and multitasking skills, with an ability to manage competing priorities in a fast paced environment.
	Exceptional accuracy and attention to detail.
	Strong analytical mindset with the ability to leverage data to inform strategic decisions and drive operational improvements.
	A proactive problem solver who can anticipate and address challenges before they escalate.
	Exceptional capacity for making sound judgments in high-pressure environments.
	Clear, unambiguous communicator who is effectively responsive across multiple communication channels.
	Budget management and financial literacy are a plus Proven experience in client service or account management roles.
	Excellent interpersonal skills for interacting with internal teams and external stakeholders.
	Have an understanding of architectural design and experience in the construction industry is a plus.


Salary
N150,000 - N250,000 per month.&nbsp;

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should&nbsp;send their CV and cover letter to:&nbsp;truehandrecruitment@gmail.com&nbsp;using &ldquo;Project Manager&rdquo; as the subject of the email.",

Project Manager Job at AL- Truehand Better Design Limited




        
    

        
        AL- Truehand Better Design Limited is an architectural anda multidisciplinary design companyfocused on providing premium design andachievable solutions. With a strong belief that everyone deserves better design. We focus on all kinds of designs and renovation, turnkey delivery, interiors, finishing and furnishingand general construction.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Project Manager
Job Location: Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilties
     

            
    




	Develop detailed project plans, including scope, timelines, budgets, and resource allocation.
	Monitor project progress, make adjustments as necessary, and ensure timely completion.
	Planning, coordinating and managing all phases of all design and construction projects, including project initiation, planning, execution, monitoring and closeout.
	Conduct risk assessments and develop mitigation strategies.
	Coordinate with the design team, operations and other contractorsto ensure all project timeline and deliverables are met.
	Collaborate with clients to understand project requirements and expectations.
	Select and manage subcontractors, ensuring they meet project specifications.
	Conduct regular site visits to monitor progress, quality, and safety.
	Resolve any issues or challenges that may arise during construction.
	Lead cross-functional project teams, including architects, engineers, and contractors.
	Foster collaboration and communication among stakeholders.
	Manage conflicts and resolve disputes.
	Liaise with clients to understand requirements and expectations.
	Provide project updates and progress reportsand ensure client satisfaction
	Ensure adherence to regulatory requirements, building codes, and company policies.
	Manage project documentation, records, and reporting.
	Ensure compliance with building codes, regulations, and safety standards.
	Assist in implementing best practices and standardized procedures to streamline projectworkflows.
	Stay updated on industry trends and best practices in projectmanagement.
	Train and supervise team membersensuring compliance with standard operating procedures.
	Provide regular status reports to Management and clients.
	Send the monthly project report to Management.
	Carry out any other duty as assigned.


Requirements


	A minimum of a Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering, Quality Control, or other relevant fields.
	Minimum of 2 to 8 years of proven experience in a similar role in the architectural or construction industry is an added advantage.
	Professional certifications such as PMP (Project Management Professional), COREN, H.S E Certification or equivalent are preferred.
	Master Degree is an added advantage
	Strong project management skills (scheduling, budgeting, risk management).
	Excellent communication, leadership, and interpersonal skills.
	Proficient in project management software (MS Project, Primavera, Asana, Trello).
	Familiarity with construction management systems (CMS).
	Knowledge of building codes, regulations, and safety standards.
	Strong attention to details and organizational skills.
	Excellent communication and problem-solving skills.
	Ability to supervise and train teammembers.
	Experience working with cross-functional teams is an advantage.
	Ability to multitask and manage time effectively.


Preferred Candidates


	Excellent time management, organization, and multitasking skills, with an ability to manage competing priorities in a fast paced environment.
	Exceptional accuracy and attention to detail.
	Strong analytical mindset with the ability to leverage data to inform strategic decisions and drive operational improvements.
	A proactive problem solver who can anticipate and address challenges before they escalate.
	Exceptional capacity for making sound judgments in high-pressure environments.
	Clear, unambiguous communicator who is effectively responsive across multiple communication channels.
	Budget management and financial literacy are a plus Proven experience in client service or account management roles.
	Excellent interpersonal skills for interacting with internal teams and external stakeholders.
	Have an understanding of architectural design and experience in the construction industry is a plus.


Salary
N150,000 - N250,000 per month. 

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and cover letter to: truehandrecruitment@gmail.com using “Project Manager” as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

title: Job Openings at Divine Infinity College
content:
At Divine Infinity College, we deliver a broad and balanced curriculum to explore knowledge, nourish creativity, and encourage independence. Our focus is to bring out the best in every child. We run both Nigerian and British Curriculum, and our learners are coached for WAEC, JAMB, and IGCSE.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Digital Marketing Tutor

Job Location: Okota / Isolo, Lagos
Employment Type: Contract

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking a skilled and passionate Digital Marketing Tutor to train students in practical, industry-relevant digital marketing skills.
	The ideal candidate will deliver hands-on lessons covering online marketing tools, strategies, and real-world applications.


Key Responsibilities


	Teach digital marketing concepts including:
	
		Social Media Marketing
		Content Creation & Branding
		Email Marketing
		SEO & Basic Analytics
		Online Advertising (Facebook/Instagram/Google Ads – basic level)
	
	
	Prepare lesson plans and training materials
	Guide students through practical projects and assignments
	Assess student progress and provide feedback
	Support learners with career and freelance opportunities.


Requirements


	Proven experience in digital marketing or related field
	Ability to teach beginners in a clear, practical manner
	Knowledge of social media platforms and marketing tools
	Teaching or training experience is an added advantage
	Strong communication and presentation skills.


Benefits


	Flexible teaching schedule
	Opportunity to impact and train young professionals
	Supportive learning environment.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: kentsantino7777@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

2.) Primary School Teacher

Job Location: Okota / Isolo, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	A reputable primary school is seeking qualified and dedicated Primary School Teachers to join its academic team. The ideal candidate should be passionate about teaching and child development.


Requirements


	Relevant teaching qualification
	Strong classroom management and lesson delivery skills
	Ability to teach core primary subjects effectively
	Good communication and interpersonal skills
	Teaching experience is an added advantage.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: dupedurot@yahoo.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

3.) Geography & History Teacher

Job Location: Okota / Isolo, Lagos
Employment Type: Part-time

Job Description


	A reputable secondary school is seeking a qualified and experienced geography & history teacher.
	The ideal candidate must be capable of teaching both subjects effectively at the secondary school level.


Requirements


	Relevant teaching qualification
	Strong knowledge of Geography and History
	Ability to manage classrooms and engage students effectively
	Good communication and lesson-planning skills
	Previous teaching experience is an advantage.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: amosandreww@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

4.) Administrative Officer

Job Location: Okota/Isolo, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a dedicated and well-organized administrative officer to join our administrative team.
	The successful candidate will play a pivotal role in supporting the daily operations of the college and ensuring effective communication and coordination among all stakeholders.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage front office and reception duties, welcoming visitors and responding to inquiries.
	Maintain accurate student records, including admissions, attendance, and documentation.
	Provide administrative support to the Head of School and teaching staff.
	Coordinate school communications, meetings, and scheduling.
	Handle official correspondence, filing, and document control.
	Support school events, examinations, and staff coordination.
	Ensure compliance with safeguarding, data protection, and confidentiality standards.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: amosandreww@gmail.com using the Job Position  as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

Administrative Officer Job at Divine Infinity College




        
    

        
        At Divine Infinity College, we deliver a broad and balanced curriculum to explore knowledge, nourish creativity, and encourage independence. Our focus is to bring out the best in every child. We run both Nigerian and British Curriculum, and our learners are coached for WAEC, JAMB, and IGCSE.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Administrative Officer

Job Location: Okota/Isolo, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking a dedicated and well-organized administrative officer to join our administrative team.
	The successful candidate will play a pivotal role in supporting the daily operations of the college and ensuring effective communication and coordination among all stakeholders.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage front office and reception duties, welcoming visitors and responding to inquiries.
	Maintain accurate student records, including admissions, attendance, and documentation.
	Provide administrative support to the Head of School and teaching staff.
	Coordinate school communications, meetings, and scheduling.
	Handle official correspondence, filing, and document control.
	Support school events, examinations, and staff coordination.
	Ensure compliance with safeguarding, data protection, and confidentiality standards.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: amosandreww@gmail.com using the Job Position  as the subject of the email.
